A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie seems to play along the magical Star Wars formula for that requires a Cantina-like setting+music\, random Alien and Alien noises\, and a money-making mascot\, random guest stars\, and simple plot to tell a safe story. Nothing inventive or innovative in this movie. Jokes and comedic dialogue felt updated and on par to space related movies of this year - Thor: Ragnarok and Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2. Owned by Disney so the film is Disney-fied. You'll enjoy the movie if you want to see an un-trained Force user win against a semi-trained Force user. A movie that summarizes 24 hour of battle\, little character development\, Kylo Napoleon Dynamite Ren\, questionable Force abilities. If you're a visual person\, the film is visually appealing. Great special effects.
